Texts.Chs: 在整个已知宇宙中没人知道它是什么或它来自何处。源典具有奇怪的特质，使它看起来像随机地扭曲着周围的现实，所以源典仍然是现存最受追捧的资源。
Texts.Eng: Nobody in the known galaxy has any clue what it is, or where it comes from. Possessing strange qualities that enable it to affect reality around it seemingly at random, Protheon remains the most sought resource in existence.

Texts.Chs: 诚然，你可能从未听说过这种材料。他们不希望您知道真相。我是从在知识部工作的一位高层人士那里听到的：他们认为，这种超凡的元素能够超越我们所知道的现实。
Texts.Eng: Of course, you have likely never before even heard of this material. They don't want you to know the truth. I heard it from someone that worked high up in the Ministry of Knowledge: they theorize that the bizarre element is capable of transcending reality as we know it.

Texts.Chs: 上面就完全没有列举处该物质可以完成的工作。而我已经看到它能在其影响范围内以细微的方式改变时间。 我已经看到它能影响重力。我甚至已经看到它能将已经死亡组织恢复到活体状态。
Texts.Eng: There is simply no telling what could be accomplished with the substance. I've seen it alter time in minute ways within its sphere of influence. I've seen it affect gravity. I've even seen it repair dead tissue back to living status.

Texts.Chs: 他们所藏于世人之下的秘密。
Texts.Eng: They don't want us to know.

Texts.Chs: 你们可能会问这是什么意思？行吧，我的朋友们，振作起来：它的存在意味着它已经触及到了许多像我们这样的维度...但却不像我们的维度。当它跨越世界之间的那些门槛时，它们会携带来自其他维度的信息和能量。
Texts.Eng: What does this mean? Well, my friends, brace yourself: It means that it has touched numerous realities like ours...yet not like ours. And when it crosses those thresholds between worlds, they carry the information and energy from other dimensions along with them.
